title: r/Relationships My Girlfriend Is A Cat!
description:
r/Relationships_Advice Would you date a cat? What about someone who thinks that they're a cat? That's the problem that OP is dealing with in today's episode. His girlfriend tells him that she has the soul of a cat and wants to start communicating in meows, so he turns to Reddit for advice because he's not exactly sure how to handle this situation. Would you dump her, or go out and buy some catnip to embrace your girlfriend's the new lifestyle choice? If you like this video and want to see more, subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit videos!
